## #2 {#q2-title .unnumbered}

<fieldset class="question" id="q2">

<div class="level" id="q2-level"></div>

$$
\expect X = \frac{1}{n} \sum_{i=1}^n x_i
$$

<!--<img class="question-image" id="q2-image" src="">-->

</label>
</div>

<div class="alternative" id="q2-option2-alternative">
<input type="radio" class="input-alternative" id="q2-option2" name="q2" value="Option 2">

$\displaystyle \text{Option} \cos 2 = \var (X + Y)$
</label>
</div>

<div class="alternative" id="q2-option3-alternative">

<label for="q2-option3" id="q2-option3-label">
$\displaystyle \text{Option} \tan 3 \defin \frac{\sin 3}{\cos 3}$
</label>
</div>

<div class="alternative" id="q2-option4-alternative">
<input type="radio" class="input-alternative" id="q2-option4" name="q2" value="Option 4">
<label for="q2-option4" id="q2-option4-label">
$\displaystyle \text{Option} \exp(4) = \expect X$
</label>
</div>
